docstring:
"""
Global Django exception and warning classes.
"""

classes.docstring: """The requested model field does not exist"""
classes.name: FieldDoesNotExist

classes.docstring: """The django.apps registry is not populated yet"""
classes.name: AppRegistryNotReady

classes.docstring: """The requested object does not exist"""
classes.name: ObjectDoesNotExist

classes.docstring: """The query returned multiple objects when only one was expected."""
classes.name: MultipleObjectsReturned

classes.docstring: """The user did something suspicious"""
classes.name: SuspiciousOperation

classes.docstring: """Suspect MIME request in multipart form data"""
classes.name: SuspiciousMultipartForm

classes.docstring: """A Suspicious filesystem operation was attempted"""
classes.name: SuspiciousFileOperation

classes.docstring: """HTTP_HOST header contains invalid value"""
classes.name: DisallowedHost

classes.docstring: """Redirect to scheme not in allowed list"""
classes.name: DisallowedRedirect

classes.docstring:
"""
    The number of fields in a GET or POST request exceeded
    settings.DATA_UPLOAD_MAX_NUMBER_FIELDS.
    """
classes.name: TooManyFieldsSent

classes.docstring:
"""
    The size of the request (excluding any file uploads) exceeded
    settings.DATA_UPLOAD_MAX_MEMORY_SIZE.
    """
classes.name: RequestDataTooBig

classes.docstring: """The request was closed before it was completed, or timed out."""
classes.name: RequestAborted

classes.docstring: """The request is malformed and cannot be processed."""
classes.name: BadRequest

classes.docstring: """The user did not have permission to do that"""
classes.name: PermissionDenied

classes.docstring: """The requested view does not exist"""
classes.name: ViewDoesNotExist

classes.docstring: """This middleware is not used in this server configuration"""
classes.name: MiddlewareNotUsed

classes.docstring: """Django is somehow improperly configured"""
classes.name: ImproperlyConfigured

classes.docstring: """Some kind of problem with a model field."""
classes.name: FieldError

classes.docstring: """An error while validating data."""
classes.name: ValidationError

classes.docstring: """A database query predicate is impossible."""
classes.name: EmptyResultSet

classes.docstring: """The user tried to call a sync-only function from an async context."""
classes.name: SynchronousOnlyOperation
